item.description:
Be An Investing Superstar - Unlock Millions in Real Estate Income and Wealth

October 26, 27, 28
Four Points Sheraton - Meriden, CT

Full details available at http://www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=v&i=495

"Exclusive Experience Reveals 7 Real Estate and Business Millionaire Secrets So You Can Make Massive Amounts Of Money In Quick Turn Profits, Passive Income, And Long Term Wealth!‚Äù

Our Super Star Speakers will teach you CUTTING EDGE Strategies for:

- Wholesaling

- Automating your Business
- Buying REOs and Notes from Banks
- Buying for long term wealth
- And so much more!

Network with successful investors and real estate professionals. Now is YOUR turn to experience Sustainable and Profitable Success.
